name: Yuidoc
body:
### YUI Doc for VBScript
This fork Of YUIDoc will work with VBScript files.

VBScript does not have a block comment. As such, this fork includes tweaks to allow docparser.js to parse a VBScript comment. It is recommended that each line of the code comment begin with two apostrophes. One to create a comment and a second to close the string literal when viewing source from within YUIDoc. 

###Example VBScript code comment
```
''/**
'' * This is an example function
'' * @method testForAwesome
'' * @param testValue {string} a value to test
'' * @return `true` when awesome is in abundance
'' */
Function testForAwesome(testValue)
    ' detect awesome
End Function
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
